meanings.definition: An instrument in a vehicle that measures and displays the speed at which the vehicle is traveling.
meanings.sent1: The speedometers in the car showed how fast we were going.
meanings.sent2: I glanced at the speedometers to check if I was driving within the speed limit.
meanings.sent3: The speedometers in the old car seemed to have a mind of their own, jumping up and down unpredictably.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like speedometers, quickly scanning the room for any signs of danger.
meanings.sent5: The speedometers lit up brightly, illuminating the dashboard in the dark night.
